description: For Windows, WolfQuest saved games are created by default in the MyDocuments\​WolfQuest\​ or MyDocuments\​WolfQuest2\​ directory. For Mac, they are stored in the WolfQuest or WolfQuest2 directory within the user's home directory.
In WolfQuest, players learn about wolf ecology by assuming the role of a wild wolf in Yellowstone National Park. WolfQuest was developed jointly by the Minnesota Zoo and Eduweb.
